name: SchoolRBT — RBT Exam Hub
description: The hub for school-based RBTs. Links to the exam prep tool, PDU courses, and supervision hour tracker. Landing page live; custom domain pending DNS.

name: RBT Study — Exam Prep
description: 500 practice questions, mock exams, domain breakdowns, and AI-powered study plans for school-based RBTs. $49/mo subscription.

name: Supervision Hour Tracker
description: Log and track RBT supervision hours. Supervisor dashboard with student progress, attention flags, and Phase 2 multi-tenant org management.

name: Behavior School Plan
description: AI-powered FBA, BIP, and IEP goal writing platform for BCBAs. FERPA-encrypted student management, 14-day trial, Stripe billing.

name: ACE CEU Platform
description: BACB-approved continuing education courses for BCBAs and RBT PDUs. Video hosting via Cloudflare R2. Final deploy blocked pending R2 credentials.

name: ReunifyScience Tools
description: Evidence-based assessments and tools for family reunification professionals. Rule-Governed vs Contingency-Shaped assessment, Fusion FA tool, CA Family Law Library.

name: ObservationPro Watch App
description: Professional behavior data collection for Apple Watch. Stealth mode, AI-powered ABC parsing, dual-tracker. In active development.

name: KCUSD Behavior Team Hub
description: Internal tool suite for the KCUSD Behavior Intervention Team. Case management, goal bank, observation tools, assessment process tracker.
